function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited capability to continue operations online","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination of burger ingredients during delivery and handling","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on telemedicine without proper training and protocols","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid development of software without thorough testing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent travel to different cities for real estate tours","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Facial recognition and photo processing software usage in public digital environments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Offering distant x-ray processing software for medical diagnosis","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unstructured interviews may lead to inconsistent data collection and analysis.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Purposive sampling may introduce selection bias into the study.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Zoom video conferencing services may be vulnerable to security breaches and privacy concerns.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close customer relationships may increase the risk of disease transmission in service smes.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Service smes may struggle to adapt to a changing service ecosystem due to lack of dynamic capabilities.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Service smes may face challenges in maintaining strategic agility and adapting to post-covid conditions, leading to a decline in performance and market relevance.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Smes in the service sector may struggle to maintain close customer relationships and sustained organizational learning and innovation during covid-19 and beyond.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in service systems due to enhanced social and emotional links with individual actors within the service system","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adverse effects of internal processes and complex structures on the deployment of co-creation capabilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective deployment of co-creation capabilities leading to lack of deep relationships with customers","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of resourcefulness in smes","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate co-creation capabilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disruptions caused by inadequate co-creation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of strategic sensitivity in service smes leading to weak capability in sensing changes in markets","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Loss of flexibility in highly efficient companies due to focus on increasing efficiency","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependency on a small leadership team in service smes for strategic decisions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decay of meta-capabilities due to focus on day-to-day operations","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for disruptions in market-testing and thought experiments","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of trust and safety among top management affecting leadership unity","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of strategic sensitivity and awareness of emergent trends in the environment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of leadership unity and commitment to difficult decisions in times of turbulence","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate resource fluidity and reconfiguring capabilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Organizations lacking the ability to sense and respond to new opportunities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to rapidly implement resource allocation and competency adjustments in response to opportunities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability to transform organizational assets to sustain flexibility and growth","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conducting in-depth interviews with managers of service smes during the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Developing new services and transforming existing ones during covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Utilizing co-creation and dynamic capabilities to foster agility in service smes","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Smes being severely affected by the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of agility in decision-making processes","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relying on examples from large companies for agility implications in strategic decision-making","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Possible spread of contagious diseases in the workplace due to close proximity of employees.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of economic collapse for smes due to prolonged closures and reduced consumer activity.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in adapting to remote work practices and maintaining productivity.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cutting down on marketing and innovation budgets during a crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementing new technologies without considering the realistic and beneficial aspects","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate integration between online and brick-and-mortar retailing","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in human interaction in offline retail spaces leading to higher risk of contagious disease spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift towards more online shopping leading to greater reliance on delivery and logistics networks","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in achieving a seamless omnichannel shopping experience","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Physical store crowding and safety management","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate sensory appeals and social presence for online retailers","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Accelerated adoption of digital solutions in traditional retailing","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
